answers.answer: Hello...It is hard to give you an answer without further information. Is this a resting heart rate? What kind of activity are you doing when you record your rate at 105?105 isn't really all that high, unless it consistently over 100.

Yes, more information would help.A rest HR of 105 is high and I think should be checked by a doctor if it persists.On the other hand 105, isn't too high for someone up and walking around, I believe.Any other unusual symptoms?I can't relate to the sugar levels, do you suffer from diabetes?

question: blood pressure is normal but heart beating rate is increasing upto 105 what will happen in future, my age is 36 years old.some time sugar levels also decreasing to 60 /  80
title: heart beat rate
